QuestData.Title: A Personal Summons
QuestData.Description: <An unfamiliar feeling wells up from deep within you, flooding your mind with thoughts and images.>$b$bHear my words, $n.$b$bOur world finds itself in the grip of a terrible crisis.$b$bI call upon you to lend your aid in this desperate hour.$b$bI am Naraat.$b$bSeek me out at once, and your calling shall be revealed.$b$bI await you at the Eastern Earthshrine in Stormwind City.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Naraat the Earthspeaker in Stormwind.
QuestData.RewardText: May your sense of honor and duty serve Azeroth well, $c.
